name: pdfmake-rtl
description: Enhanced PDFMake with comprehensive RTL (Arabic/Persian/Urdu) support - Production ready package

scripts.build: run-s build:clean build:node build:browser build:standard-fonts build:fonts build:cairo build:vfs
scripts.build:3rdparty: shx cp node_modules/svg-to-pdfkit/source.js src/3rd-party/svg-to-pdfkit/source.js && shx cp node_modules/svg-to-pdfkit/LICENSE src/3rd-party/svg-to-pdfkit/LICENSE && git apply src/3rd-party/svg-to-pdfkit/0001-fix-contains.patch
scripts.build:standard-fonts: shx mkdir -p build/standard-fonts && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/standard-fonts/Courier.js" > build/standard-fonts/Courier.js && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/standard-fonts/Helvetica.js" > build/standard-fonts/Helvetica.js && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/standard-fonts/Times.js" > build/standard-fonts/Times.js && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/standard-fonts/Symbol.js" > build/standard-fonts/Symbol.js && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/standard-fonts/ZapfDingbats.js" > build/standard-fonts/ZapfDingbats.js
scripts.build:fonts: shx mkdir -p build/fonts && shx mkdir -p build/fonts/Roboto && shx cp -r fonts/Roboto/*.* build/fonts/Roboto && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/fonts/Roboto.js" > build/fonts/Roboto.js
scripts.build:cairo: shx mkdir -p build/fonts && shx mkdir -p build/fonts/Cairo && shx cp -r fonts/Cairo/*.* build/fonts/Cairo && brfs "./src/browser-extensions/fonts/Cairo.js" > build/fonts/Cairo.js

author: Aycer(based on original PDFMake by Bartek Pampuch)
